p: Further, the phenolic acids caffeic acid and p-coumaric acid and the flavonoid quercetin identified are also associated with antioxidant activity, due to their direct action in the capture of free radicals [ 61â€“ 63]. The EEB and EEL exhibited promising antioxidant activity in the DPPH and ABTS assay, when compared with that of ascorbic and BHT, reference antioxidants. In particular, EEB presented a higher antioxidant potential than EEL in both the tests.
